doc:
Arthur Young (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Young_(actor) 0 Arthur Young (2 September 1898 – 24 February 1959) was an English actor, notable for roles including Gladstone in the 1951 The Lady with a Lamp. He can be seen as a window cleaner in the film Radio Parade of 1935. He regularly appeared on BBC radio plays and was a member of the Corporation’s Drama Repertory Company in the late 1950s. Arthur_Young ( 2_September_1898 – 24_February_1959 ) was an_English_actor , notable for roles including Gladstone in the_1951 The_Lady with a_Lamp . He can_be_seen as a_window cleaner in the_film_Radio_Parade of 1935 . He regularly appeared on BBC_radio plays_and_was a_member of the_Corporation ’s_Drama_Repertory_Company in the_late_1950s .
